name: T.V. Lockup
description:
After watching the TV for so long, you've become accustomed to this way of life. All you remember now is the channels you flick through; each channel with it's own unique theme and movement burning the image into your soul. 

Only you can save yourself.

Project Details:

This game was built for the CreateChester Game Jam 2020, with the theme of One Mechanic.  This game was made in 72hrs, with a team of all students.  

Controls:
  • Mouse only
Requirements: 
  • Windows PC
Team Members: 
  • Jonathan Blackledge (Level 6)
  • Ryan Collett (Level 6) 
  • James Rawcliffe (Level 6) 
  • Joshua Smith (Level 4)
  • Joseph Abdo (Level 4)
  • Mahdi Karim (Level 5)
DISCLAIMER: THIS GAME CONTAINS MANY FAST FLASHING IMAGES THAT MAY TRIGGER PHOTOSENSITIVE EPILEPSY
